info.name: Alternative Google Inbox
info.description: An alternative look for Google Inbox, that is darker, cleaner, and uses transparency.
info.additionalInfo:
- Only works for Google Inbox.

Versions
.: Version 0.3 :.
- Added a background to the date-text fields to make them more visible.

.: Version 0.2 :.
- Fixed a small bug with multi-thread mails

.: Version 0.1 :.
- Created
